{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# 图形\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "## 基本绘图函数\n",
    "\n",
    "\n",
    "### 创建二维线图\n",
    "\n",
    "绘图函数具有不同的形式，具体取决于输入参数。\n",
    "\n",
    "- 如果**y**是一个向量，则**plot(y)**语句将绘制出以**y**中元素的下标为横坐标、元素值为纵坐标、各点以线段相连的线条。\n",
    "- 如果**x**和**y**都是向量，则它们的长度必须相同，**plot(x,y)**语句将绘制出以**x**中元素值为横坐标、**y**中元素值为纵坐标、各点以线段相连的线条。\n",
    "\n",
    "使用冒号运算符创建值在 0 到**2Π**间的向量**x** ,计算这些值的正弦值,并绘制结果。"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 4,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x=0:pi/100:2*pi;\n",
    "y=sin(x);\n",
    "plot(x,y)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "添加坐标轴标注和标题。函数**xlabel**中的字符**\\pi**创建符号**Π**，**title**函数中的**FontSize**属性可调整标题文本的字号。"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 6,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x=0:pi/100:2*pi;\n",
    "y=sin(x);\n",
    "plot(x,y)\n",
    "xlabel('x=0:2\\pi')\n",
    "ylabel('Sine of x')\n",
    "title('Plot of the Sine Function','FontSize',12)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### 在一个图形中绘制多条曲线\n",
    "\n",
    "通过调用一次**plot**函数，**MATLAB**根据多对x-y数据绘制出多条颜色不同的曲线。\n",
    "\n",
    "例如，这些语句绘制出三个与**x**相关的函数："
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 8,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x=0:pi/100:2*pi;\n",
    "y=sin(x);\n",
    "y2=sin(x-.25);\n",
    "y3=sin(x-.5);\n",
    "plot(x,y,x,y2,x,y3)"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "函数**legend**提供了一种简便易行的方法来标注各条曲线："
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 10,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "x=0:pi/100:2*pi;\n",
    "y=sin(x);\n",
    "y2=sin(x-.25);\n",
    "y3=sin(x-.5);\n",
    "plot(x,y,x,y2,x,y3)\n",
    "\n",
    "legend('sin(x)','sin(x-.25)','sin(x-.5)')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### 指定线条样式和颜色\n",
    "\n",
    "使用**plot**命令绘制数据时,可以指定线条颜色、样式和添加标记(如加号或圆圈)："
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "`plot(x,y,'color_style_marker')`"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "**color_style_marker**包含一到四个字符(通过单引号隔开),由颜色、线条样式和标记类型构成。例如,"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 12,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "image/png": "\n",
      "text/plain": [
       "<IPython.core.display.Image object>"
      ]
     },
     "metadata": {},
     "output_type": "display_data"
    }
   ],
   "source": [
    "plot(x,y,'r:+')"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "使用红线绘制数据,并在每个数据点放置符号“**+**” 标记。\n",
    "\n",
    "**color_style_marker**由以下部分组成。\n",
    "\n",
    "| 类型 | 符号                                                         | 说明                                                         |\n",
    "| ---- | ------------------------------------------------------------ | ------------------------------------------------------------ |\n",
    "| 颜色 | **‘c'**<br />**'m'**<br />**'y'**<br />**'r'**<br />**'g'**<br />**'b'**<br />**'w'**<br />**'k'** | 青蓝色<br />品红色<br />黄色<br />红色<br />绿色<br />蓝色<br />白色<br />黑色 |\n",
    "| 线型 | **‘-’**<br />**’--’**<br />**‘:’**<br />**‘-.'**<br />**'no character'** | 实线<br />虚线<br />点线<br />点画线<br />无                 |\n",
    "| 标记 | **’+‘**<br />**’o'**<br />**'*'**<br />**'x'**<br />**'s'**<br />**'d'**<br />**'^'**<br />**'v'**<br />**'>'**<br />**'<'**<br />**'p'**<br />**‘h'**<br />**no character** | 加号<br />圆圈<br />星号<br />叉号<br />方形<br />菱形<br />上三角<br />下三角<br />右三角<br />左三角<br />五角形<br />六角形<br />无 |"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": null,
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": []
  }
 ],
